RelatedSentence: | The FBI has issued Wanted posters for five members of the Chinese military who have been charged with running a cyber espionage operation targeting U.S. companies .
| The FBI has issued Wanted posters for five members of the Chinese military who have been charged with running a cyber espionage operation targeting U.S. companies .
Prosecutors say the men work inside the People 's Liberation Army as part of an elite hacking unit .
